title: Watzek Library User Survey, 2024
text: During the academic year of 2023-4, members of Watzek Library staff developed and distributed a survey to undergraduate and graduate students. The purpose was to gain feedback from students on Watzek Library resources, services, aspects of the building, and degree of helpfulness from staff.

title: Watzek Library User Survey, 2024
text: During the academic year of 2023-4, members of Watzek Library staff developed and distributed a survey to undergraduate and graduate students. The purpose was to gain feedback from students on Watzek Library resources, services, aspects of the building, and degree of helpfulness from staff.

title: Frequency of Visits
text:
Users were asked to indicate the their self-reported frequency of visits to Watzek Library based upon a number of factors:
